nodes.text: The JND-41 percussive cannon was a percussive cannon designed by Tostovin Munitions. It was used by the Hylobon Enforcers of Crimson Dawn.

Manufactured by Tostovin Munitions, the JND-41 percussive cannon was a powerful weapon that was covered with a black finish and gold accents. The percussive cannon had enough stopping power to eliminate any threat.
Toht Ra, the attendant on Vos' yacht First Light, was one of the Hylobons who used a percussive cannon. Several Hylobon Enforcers used JND-41s during the Showdown on Savareen.
